summary: The true story of two New York City cops. Greenberg & Hantz fought the system, became detectives and were known on the streets as "Batman & Robin".
cast: Ron Leibman|David Selby|Sheila Frazier|Pat Hingle|Dan Frazer|Joseph Sirola|Arny Freeman|Bernard Kates|Alex Colon|Charles Turner|Ralph Wilcox|Al Fann|David Greenberg|Robert Hantz|Norman Bush|Arthur French|Tamu Blackwell|Hector Troy|Charles White|Ralph Strait|Joseph P. McCartney|Pat Corley|Albert Henderson|Barton Heyman|Eddie Barth|Don Billett|Rudy Bond|Sam Coppola|Barry Corbin|James Dukas|James Gallery|Louis Guss|Earle Hyman|Tony Lip|Stephen Macht|Patrick V. Murphy|Lee Steele|Steve Vignari
keywords: buddy cop|fistfight|martial arts|hand to hand combat|street shootout
title: Los super polis
